unnormalised: Guys, NH44 is a nightmare after Ambala! Took me 14 hrs to reach Delhi from Chandigarh, while the volvo usually takes 6-7 hrs max. Avoid if you can!
normalised: Guys, N-H forty four is a nightmare after Ambala! Took me fourteen hours to reach Delhi from Chandigarh, while the volvo usually takes six to seven hours max. Avoid if you can!
